text: Alan Smart (born October 10, 1963) best known for his work as the supervising director on SpongeBob SquarePants, which he has been involved with since the horror and series, and as assistant director and layout artist on The Simpsons (he also received credit as a director in the season three and twenty-second episode, "Flaming Moe's 500 Keys"). He has done animation for the Nicktoons CatDog, Hey Arnold, Rocko's Modern Life, Ren and Stimpy and FOX TV Shows King of the Hill director in 2001 Chasing Bobby season 5 episode 9 and The Simpsons director in 2011 episode 500 Keys ==Filmography== The Simpsons episodes directors (1991-2011) November 21, 1991 *"Flaming Moe's (with "Rich Moore")" (1991) *"500 Keys" (2011) Bobby World episodes *"Nightmare on Bobby's Street" (1991) *"Bobby the Candidate" (1996) Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American television directors Category:American movie directors
title: Alan Smart
